content: ईशान {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [ईश् ताच्छील्ये चानश्] {@--1@} Owning, possessing, master or lord. {@--2@} Reigning, ruling. {@--3@} Wealthy, rich. --नः {@--1@} A ruler, master, lord. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva; ईशानसंदर्शनलालसानां <ls>Ku. 7. 56</ls>; <ls>K. 10.</ls> {@--3@} The Ārdrā Nakṣatra. {@--4@} One of the Rudras. {@--5@} The number ‘eleven’. {@--6@} The sun as a form of Śiva. {@--7@} A Sādhya. {@--8@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. --नी <ab>N.</ab> of Durgā. --नी, --नः The silk-cotton tree (शाल्मली). --नं Light, splendour.
